FoodBox diet paln example

You can come up with countless plans with the food items you have in your grocery list. this is just an example of how you can form your custom meal plan that fits your life style.

*Important* Please Read

After years of dieting and trying countless dieting methods we found out that the main reasons for failure are not merely a perfect detailed meal plan or ones discipline and will power. Although it‚Äôs necessary to be discipline enough to put in to work to get what you want, But still if you don‚Äôt know the top reasons of failure when it comes to dieting you will be unaware of them; Therefore you will be more likely to fail as well.

Top Reasons of failure in Diet

1. Not having a system to follow

When it comes to dieting consistency is everything and without a system to follow, you are doomed to failure. What we mean by a system is to have a structure for your day to rely on and to not make decisions constantly on the macros and the calories of the food you need to take. By this point almost all of us know that in order to lose weight we need to be in a caloric deficit (eat less than we need) and to gain weight we need to be in caloric surplus (eat more than we need). That‚Äôs being said you might recall an experience you had to lose weight, where you didn‚Äôt eat much food in order to lose weight. but it seems that with all of those torture still nothing happened. Please stick around until the end to learn all the tools you need to make it work this time.

2. Unsuitable environment

If you see your favorite snack or sweet on the table. You might resist the temptation for the first time, However your will power get exhausted. After passing by for couple of times you will eventually give up to temptation and eat that snack or sweet. If you did it once it‚Äôs more likely to happen again. A snack leads to a sweet and a sweet leads to another thing. At the end you see yourself back to your old bad habits. When it comes to dieting we need to imagine our will power as limited resources that each time we use it we lose a bit of it until we are left with no defense in front of our temptation. We will teach you how to face this problem in our FoodBox Method to overcome these common challenges.

There are many other reasons for failure in diet click here to read them, but the above are the main one‚Äôs.

How to overcome these problems

After numerus tries we came up with a simple method called FoodBox, Where we impose a flexible system in you life we monitor your exact food intake and make sure that you hit the right macros without a lot of hustle and in the same time you don‚Äôt fill so restricted on what to eat. Please continue reading because just giving you a meal plan won‚Äôt help you achieve you goal.

What is the FoodBox method?

FoodBox is a method we use to make sure that we will never go off track in our diet. FoodBox and sprint main focuses is to minimize the use of your will power and decision making in your daily eating habits. You can imagine it as a home kitchen store where you can eat anything from it at any time in the way you like, with keeping one rule in your mind. The store Should last for 1 sprint (3 days) and you can fill your store again and repeat the process. You will see the word sprint comes a lot with FoodBox. that‚Äôs because they work with each other to create the system. When you generate a meal plan we give you a grocery list for 1 sprint(3 day). All the items included in the grocery list are generated and calculated precisely base on you inputs.

What is sprint

Sprint is the duration that it takes for your store to be finished.

What is store

Storeis all of the food you can take in 1 sprint (3 days). Basically the provided grocery list is store. Meaning you cannot eat certain things out of your store.

How Foodbox solve the probelm?

By structuring your day in a systematic way you will habitually do everything. For example, The first 2 week you will think more about how to do each step and it‚Äôs totally normal because it‚Äôs something new to you. However, after a while you won‚Äôt even think about the steps. In fact you won‚Äôt even need to weight your food because you will habitually know what is good and how much is enough for you in order to get results. That is the secret, make it as easy as possible to follow the diet and be consistent with it for couple of month and see the power of consistency. From long experience we have learned that this way worked much better than the traditional way of counting macros every day. Why? Can you run with your full speed for several hours? Obviously no. Diet is the same it‚Äôs not a 100 meter race it‚Äôs a marathon where you need to know how to preserve your energy until the finish line. FoodBox try's to put you on the right track and leave you there to enjoy the ride yourself. When you go to buy the first grocery list you get the idea of what good food is and how much you need. Then when you prepare the food for the first time(not easy at all be ready for the frustration) you learn how meal preparation is been done. Finally when you eat the food you cooked you feel the difference in your mood and performance. That‚Äôs it now you changed your path. have to stick to it until you don‚Äôt even think of it as Ohh it‚Äôs so difficult you just do it and enjoy the benefits. Happy ride üòä.

What is the difference between the FoodBox and regular meal plan?

Unlike the traditional meal plan where it tells you exactly (what, how much and when) to eat it every day, FoodBox doesn‚Äôt strict you to the details. In fact it gives you the full ability to eat as you like when you like. FoodBox look at the diet in the bigger picture which is 1 sprint. By monitoring your resources in 3 days FoodBox make sure that you will stay on track and in the same time you will be as flexible as possible.

How to put the Foodbox into action?

Time for the fun part
Step 1

Raw proteins should be boxed upfront for 1 sprint at the start of the sprint. That is where the name FoodBox came from. For example you might have something like this:

BeefBox

ChickenBox

We recommend you to preserve it in the most convenient way to you. Personally we marinate the proteins for better taste and more safety. You might even buy ready to eat proteins like ü¶É turkey for example in this case you already have it boxed by default.

TurkeyBox

Step 2

Raw carbs and vegetable should be prepared once a day. Either at the start of the day or the night before.

Step 3

Single foods can be cooked or eaten on spot since they require no time to be required.

Step 4

You might need to use food ‚öñÔ∏è scale for the first 2 sprints, so you can have an idea of how to split your food to 3 days. Once you got comfortable with it you can ignore the food weighting, Because we are confident that we are on the right track and we are hitting the right macros in 1 sprint.

Step 5

Once you reached the end of your sprint and your store has finished you can adjust your food resources again using our smart meal plan generator. Or if your were satisfied with the it, you can continue to the next sprint.

Step 6

When it comes to recipes we are unopinionated, That is because everyone is different. In FoodBox method we made sure that the basics and the foundation of a practical meal plan are followed. That is being said we still have some recipes for each FoodBox to get you going if you‚Äôre not sure where to start. Click on the each FoodBox so you can see the video.
